(Simplified: 桤)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 豈 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 豈 [ qǐ ] what; how
①(榿木)落葉喬木，葉長倒卵形，果穗橢圓形，下垂，木質較軟，嫩葉可作茶的代用品。
榿樹 [ qī shù ]: long peduncled alder (Alnus cremastogyne); Alnus trebeculata
榿木 [ qī mù ]: alder

榿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
［《字彙》牽奚切］
“桤1”的繁体字。
落叶乔木。叶长椭圆形。柔荑花序，果穗椭圆形，下垂。

榿字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榿； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页545第15
【韻會】丘其切，音?。木名。【益部方物記】民家樹榿，不三年，材可倍常，疾種移取，里人以爲利。【杜甫·覓榿木栽詩】飽聞榿樹三年大，爲致溪邊十畝隂。【王安石·榿木詩】濯錦江邊木有榿，野園封植佇華滋。地偏幸免桓魋伐，歲晚還同庾信移。　又【正字通】苦駭切，音楷。又【齊東野語】榿字，五來切，音獃。義?同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wooden Word Department] 　 Jie; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 545 No. 15
[Rhyme Meeting] Qiu Qiqie, sound?. Wooden name. [Yibu Fangwu Ji] The folk tree alder, in less than three years, can be more frequent, and the saplings are transplanted, and the insiders think it is profitable. [Du Fu·Looking for Alder Planting Poems] I've heard that the alder tree is three years old, which is to cause 10 acres of shade by the stream. 【Wang Anshi·Alder Poems】There are alder trees beside the Zhuojin River, and the wild gardens are closed and planted. The land was spared from being attacked, and he moved with Yu Xin at the end of the year.　 [Zhengzitong] bitter and horrified, in regular sound. Also [Qidong Yeyu] Alder, cut in five, dull. Righteous? Same.
